name: STAR WARS COPPERCUBE ARCADE
description:
Non-commercial fan game inspired by the great franchise created by George Lucas, now owned by Disney.

Arcade style game with various challenges from the Star Wars universe!

Pilot a race pod on Tatooine;

Fight tie fighters with an X-wing;

Defeat Stormtroppers and collect all holocrons;

And many other challenges!

This game contains arcade-style combat systems, with simple systems designed to offer different experiences!

Powered by Coppercube engine.

Andgameplay 2023, By andré Luis

Contact: andrewqi_@hotmail.com
